```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(rgdal)
library(leaflet)
library(leaflet.extras)
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(stringr)
```

## Load map datasets into R
```{r}
bikes <- readOGR("Bike_Network.geojson")
plot(bikes)

facilities <- readOGR("City_Facilities_pub.geojson")
plot(facilities)

rec <- readOGR("ppr_districts_2018.geojson")
plot(rec)
```

#Consolidated Bike map with basemap selection option 
```{r}
leaflet(data = bikes) %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$Stamen.Toner, group = 'Stamen')%>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$Stamen.Terrain, group = 'Terrain') %>%
  addLayersControl(
    baseGroups = c("Stamen", "Terrain")
#    ,overlayGroups = c("DE", "FR")
    ,options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE)
) %>%
    addPolylines(color = "#63CBD3")
```


## Leaflet Philly bike map with lines
```{r}
leaflet(data = bikes) %>%
  addProviderTiles("Stamen.Toner") %>%
  addPolylines(color = "#63CBD3")
```

# Leaflet Stamen Terrain map with Bike overlay
```{r}
leaflet(data = bikes) %>%
  addProviderTiles("Stamen.Terrain") %>%
  addPolylines(color = "#63CBD3")

```

## Leaflet Philly parks and rec services
```{r}
leaflet(data = rec) %>%
  addProviderTiles("Stamen.Toner") %>%
  addPolygons(color = "#63CBD3")
```
## Leaflet Philly services
```{r}
leaflet(data = facilities) %>%
  addProviderTiles("Stamen.Toner") %>%
  #addCircleMarkers()
  addMarkers(
    clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions()
    )
```
